name: koa-ssdb-cache
description: a middleware for koa to cache response with ssdb.

scripts.test-cov: node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -R dot -t 5000 test/*.js
scripts.test-travis: node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R dot -t 5000 test/*.js

author: iwater
